# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-optimize-1.0.0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1084/org/openo/sdno/optimize/ct_optimizer/1.0.0/ct_optimizer-1.0.0.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-optimize-1.0.0.zip && rm -f sdno-optimize-1.0.0.zip
EXPOSE 8620
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0 autorelease-1084 > OPENO_VERSION
